content.description: Friction your way up over small holds, past 5, maybe 6 bolts. The route runs up the middle of a 40' wide, well featured, slab . Where the anchors are located you can top rope at least 4 different lines without sharing a hold.
content.protection: 5 or 6 Quickdraws, and a .75, or #1 Camalot to place between the last bolt and the anchor. There is a 2 bolt anchor with webbing that may need to be changed out due to sun bleaching.
content.location: Head toward the back of the canyon, and start looking up to the right before you get to the dark varnished rock. The slab has a mix of varnish and lighter rock and is just left of a big left facing dihedral.
